Source.Name: apr
Source.Summary: The Apache Portable Runtime (APR) library provides an abstraction of operating-system level services
Source.Description: The Apache Portable Runtime (APR) library provides an abstraction of operating-system level services such as file and network I/O, memory management, and so on.
